channel.title: Homes on Joost Plattel
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Joost Plattel

item.description: About I help organizations and individuals develop and build strategies for data-related questions and opportunities. I create experimental models, data visualizations, APIs and dashboards based on feedback-loops and experiences. The question I try to answer is: How do we use all the data generated every second? How do we turn it into information, to knowledge and finally wisdom? I’m often asked to give lectures and talks about data, experiments, ethics and difficult or weird questions to make people think.
